data.title: Find a Radio Station
data.meta_description: Our award-winning radio show is heard by approximately 200,000 listeners on 200 radio stations nationwide. If you'd like to listen to The People's Pharmacy on your local public radio station, but it isn't on the list below, why not contact the program director and request it when you pledge your support?
data.text:
Our award-winning radio show is heard by approximately 200,000 listeners on 200 radio stations nationwide. Tune in each week to hear the latest expert opinions on cutting edge medical research and real news you can use to take control of your own health.

The People’s Pharmacy® is your source for health information: from breaking news on drugs to the top health headlines of the week, information on alternative therapies to using herbs and home remedies for common ailments, we are here to help you become your own best health advocate.

If you’d like to listen to The People’s Pharmacy on your local public radio station, but it isn’t on the list below, why not contact the program director and request it when you pledge your support? Program directors with questions may contact us at 888-472-3366.

Recent shows are also available as a free podcast. You can either find us in iTunes or stream episodes directly from the show page on this website.

The People’s Pharmacy® is on the current program schedule for the following stations.
